short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Usefull tool for filtering Linkedin job search results with preferred languages and specific forbidden pharases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Choose your preferred languages or add your forbidden pharases ​​from the extension settings.
   The language filter will be active on the search page and will only show you jobs published in 
   your preferred languages or without forbidden pharases.
 

* Check out screenshots for more information.
 
** New Version 1.1.2  ** 
 - Forbidden Pharases
 - Delay Time Adjustment
